data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Stara Zagora prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Stara Zagora, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Stara Zagora will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Stara Zagora, Bulgaria to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 305,230 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Stara Zagora, Bulgaria not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Turk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Turk people know you.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Stara Zagora, Bulgaria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Stara Zagora, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Stara Zagora to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
